name: Asonde AIUEO
overview: Asonde Aiueo is an educational game similar to the Kids Station or Lightspan game series, in which the young kids can learn about how to read hiragana and katakana (the game features more than 200 words) meanwhile they are playing cute mini games with 6 different animal characters as their host. In the game they learn about the japanese letters, pronunciation, letter and shape associations, etc.
